pullRequest.title: Print `initialized` stanza to each file
pullRequest.bodyText:
OMR: eclipse/omr#5607
When using -Xverbosegclog, prints Initialized stanza at the beginning of each file.
In order to achieve this, following changes have been made:
In MM_VerboseHandlerOutputRealtime:

Replace handleInitializedInnerStanzas with outputInitializedInnerStanza to print metronome stanza to one VerboseBuffer

In MM_VerboseHandlerOutputStandardJava, 'MM_VerboseHandlerOutputRealtime', 'MM_VerboseHandlerJava',modify writeVmArgs() to take a VerboseBuffer

nodes.bodyText: Please look into if this needs to be changed to use buffer. I think it does like outputInitializedInnerStanza is
Minor nit pick: extension to extensions

afterCommit.message:
Print `initialized` stanza to each file
https://github.com/eclipse/omr/pull/5607

When using `-Xverbosegclog` flag, prints 'Initialized' stanza at the beginning of each file.
In order to achieve this, following changes have been made:

In `MM_VerboseHandlerOutputRealtime`:
- Replace `handleInitializedInnerStanzas()` with `outputInitializedInnerStanza()` to print
 `metronome` stanza to one `VerboseBuffer`.

In `MM_VerboseHandlerOutputStandardJava`, 'MM_VerboseHandlerOutputRealtime',
'MM_VerboseHandlerJava', modify `writeVmArgs()` to take a `VerboseBuffer`.

Signed-off-by: Enson Guo <enson.guo@ibm.com>

In `MM_VerboseHandlerOutputStandardJava`, 'MM_VerboseHandlerOutputRealtime',
